channel.title: Jonathan Michaelsen on Bloomington Playwrights Project
channel.description: Recent content in Jonathan Michaelsen on Bloomington Playwrights Project

item.title: Apropos of Nothing
item.description: Owen confesses, apropos of nothing, that he’s in love with his best friend’s wife. But it’s just “a passing phase,” he tells him. “Forget I even said it.” Unfortunately, no one can. And now that it’s out there, everyone’s lives are turned upside-down, and no one’s relationship is safe from the wreckage. In a comedy about love, irony, and cliché, five people struggle with…well…love, irony, and cliché. Contains adult language and situations.
